trait.name: Reduced Threat
entries: A reduced-threat monster takes a −2 penalty on attack rolls (included in the stat block), ability checks (included in the stat block for skill proficiencies), saving throws (included in the stat block for saving throw proficiencies), and saving throw DCs (included in the stat block).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
